open.author.name: Marek Marecki
message:
Add simple benchmarking and profiling utilities to kernel

A few ideas are to measure time spent executing single instructions,
whole functions, average process lifetime, and total runtime of a
program.

The kernel could also count spawned processes, and sent and
received messages, how many times a function has been called, how
many times an instruction has been executed, etc.
project.name: Viua Virtual Machine
